InputOutputs.Name: SetAgitationLevel
InputOutputs.Description: Set the agitation level

InputOutputs.Name: EnableBlinking
InputOutputs.Description: Turn on procedural blinks

InputOutputs.Name: DisableBlinking
InputOutputs.Description: Turn off procedural blinks

InputOutputs.Name: EnableLookAt
InputOutputs.Description: Turn on procedural look-ats

InputOutputs.Name: DisableLookAt
InputOutputs.Description: Turn off the procedural look-ats

InputOutputs.Name: LockRightHand
InputOutputs.Description: Turn on the right hand IK lock

InputOutputs.Name: UnlockRightHand
InputOutputs.Description: Turn off the right hand IK lock

InputOutputs.Name: LockLeftHand
InputOutputs.Description: Turn on the left hand IK lock

InputOutputs.Name: UnlockLeftHand
InputOutputs.Description: Turn off the left hand IK lock

InputOutputs.Name: EnableInteracionSensing
InputOutputs.Description: Turn on ineraction sensing

InputOutputs.Name: DisableInteracionSensing
InputOutputs.Description: Turn off ineractions sensing

InputOutputs.Name: EnableChoreoLookAts
InputOutputs.Description: Enable lookAts to be driven from VCDs

InputOutputs.Name: DisableChoreoLookAts
InputOutputs.Description: Use animgraph-driven lookAts

InputOutputs.Name: EnableFacing
InputOutputs.Description: Enable facing the animgraph facing direction

InputOutputs.Name: DisableFacing
InputOutputs.Description: Disable facing the animgraph facing direction

InputOutputs.Name: IgnorePlayer
InputOutputs.Description: Ignore Player as a possible Look Target when picking random lookAts.

InputOutputs.Name: DisableRandomLookAts
InputOutputs.Description: Disables the AI's random lookAts.

InputOutputs.Name: EnableRandomLookAts
InputOutputs.Description: Enables the AI's random lookAts.

InputOutputs.Name: ForceLookAtTarget
InputOutputs.Description: Set named actor to be the look at target

InputOutputs.Name: ClearForcedLookAtTarget
InputOutputs.Description: Clear the look at target set by ForceLookAtTarget

InputOutputs.Name: LookAtIgnoreHands
InputOutputs.Description: NPC does not look at the player hands

InputOutputs.Name: LookAtUseHands
InputOutputs.Description: NPC will look at the player hands
